about_the_game:
The Naughty Girl 2 - Original soundtrack is a pack with all the 8 Original tracks made for the game. Now you can relax with the songs of the game while doing anything else!

  • Leon Richards III - Prelude n4 in Sol Maggiore
  • Leon Richards III - Diary Pathway
  • Leon Richards III - Spartiti in Mi Minore
  • Leon Richards III - Loose Strings
  • Leon Richards III - Sustaining the Moment
  • Leon Richards III - Hang Song
  • Leon Richards III - Suoni di Vetro
  • Leon Richards III - Little Pizzicato Piece n7

The Songs are on MP3 format and can be found on the game's folder.
'\Steam\steamapps\common\Naughty Girl 2\Soundtrack'

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content.
The characters showed in the game are all over 18 years old.
